mapper.select: WITH X AS (SELECT D.act_type AS act_type1, D.specialty_id AS specialty_id1, D.product_type AS product_type1, E.ACT_TYPE AS ACT_TYPE2, E.SPECIALTY_CODE AS specialty_id2, E.PRODUCT_TYPE AS PRODUCT_TYPE2, D.ID from gom_disp_srv_s A, GOM_PS_2_WO_S B, UOS_TACHE C, GOM_DISP_DETAIL_SRV_S D, gom_ord_key_info E where B.id = #{psId} AND E.Order_Id = #{orderId} AND B.tache_id = C.id and A.tache_code = C.tache_code AND D.DISP_SRV_ID = A.ID AND A.AREA_ID = E.REGION_ID AND A.REC_STATE = '170000001' AND D.REC_STATE = '170000001'), X2 AS (select distinct act_type1, specialty_id1, product_type1, ACT_TYPE2, specialty_id2, PRODUCT_TYPE2, ID from (select X.* from X where (X.ACT_TYPE1 = X.ACT_TYPE2 AND X.ACT_TYPE2 IS NOT NULL) UNION ALL select X.* from X where (X.SPECIALTY_ID1 = X.SPECIALTY_ID2 AND X.SPECIALTY_ID2 IS NOT NULL) UNION ALL select X.* from X where (X.PRODUCT_TYPE1 = X.PRODUCT_TYPE2 AND X.PRODUCT_TYPE2 IS NOT NULL))), X3 AS (select distinct act_type1, specialty_id1, product_type1, ACT_TYPE2, specialty_id2, PRODUCT_TYPE2, ID from (select * from X2 WHERE X2.ACT_TYPE1 = X2.ACT_TYPE2 AND (X2.SPECIALTY_ID1 = X2.SPECIALTY_ID2 OR X2.SPECIALTY_ID1 IS NULL) AND (X2.PRODUCT_TYPE1 = X2.PRODUCT_TYPE2 OR X2.PRODUCT_TYPE1 IS NULL) UNION ALL select * from X2 WHERE X2.SPECIALTY_ID1 = X2.SPECIALTY_ID2 AND (X2.ACT_TYPE1 = X2.ACT_TYPE2 OR X2.ACT_TYPE1 IS NULL) AND (X2.PRODUCT_TYPE1 = X2.PRODUCT_TYPE2 OR X2.PRODUCT_TYPE1 IS NULL) UNION ALL select * from X2 WHERE X2.PRODUCT_TYPE1 = X2.PRODUCT_TYPE2 AND (X2.ACT_TYPE1 = X2.ACT_TYPE2 OR X2.ACT_TYPE1 IS NULL) AND (X2.SPECIALTY_ID1 = X2.SPECIALTY_ID2 OR X2.SPECIALTY_ID1 IS NULL))) select count(act_type1) as actType, count(specialty_id1) as specialtyCode, count(product_type1) as productType from x3

SELECT NVL2(D.DISP_OBJ_ID, D.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || D.DISP_OBJ_ID|| '_J!G@F_' ||D.IS_AUTO, B.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || B.DISP_OBJ_ID|| '_J!G@F_' ||'210000002') from gom_disp_srv_s A, GOM_PS_2_WO_S B, UOS_TACHE C, GOM_DISP_DETAIL_SRV_S D, gom_ord_key_info E where B.id = #{psId} AND E.Order_Id = #{orderId} AND B.tache_id = C.id and A.tache_code = C.tache_code AND D.DISP_SRV_ID = A.ID AND A.AREA_ID = E.REGION_ID
AND D.ACT_TYPE = E.ACT_TYPE
AND D.SPECIALTY_ID=E.SPECIALTY_CODE
AND D.PRODUCT_TYPE=E.PRODUCT_TYPE
AND A.REC_STATE = '170000001' AND D.REC_STATE='170000001'

SELECT D.SRC_TACHE_CODE,D.SRC_TACHE_STAFF,D.IS_AUTO from gom_disp_srv_s A, GOM_PS_2_WO_S B, UOS_TACHE C, GOM_DISP_DETAIL_SRV_S D, gom_ord_key_info E where B.id = #{psId} AND E.Order_Id = #{orderId} AND B.tache_id = C.id and A.tache_code = C.tache_code AND D.DISP_SRV_ID = A.ID AND A.AREA_ID = E.REGION_ID
AND D.ACT_TYPE = E.ACT_TYPE
AND D.SPECIALTY_ID=E.SPECIALTY_CODE
AND D.PRODUCT_TYPE=E.PRODUCT_TYPE
AND A.REC_STATE = '170000001' AND D.REC_STATE='170000001'
SELECT ws.id,ws.tache_id, t.tache_code, t.tache_name FROM gom_ps_2_wo_s ws LEFT JOIN uos_tache t ON t.id = ws.tache_id WHERE ws.id = #{psId} AND ws.rec_state = '170000001'

select case when NO1 <> 1 then (SELECT c.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || c.DISP_OBJ_ID FROM gom_bdw_srv_ord_info a LEFT JOIN gom_disp_srv_s b ON b.area_id = a.mainorg_bdw LEFT JOIN GOM_DISP_DETAIL_SRV_S c ON c.DISP_SRV_ID = b.id LEFT JOIN UOS_TACHE e ON e.tache_code = b.tache_code LEFT JOIN GOM_PS_2_WO_S d ON d.tache_id = e.id WHERE a.order_id =#{orderId} AND d.id = #{psId} AND b.REC_STATE = '170000001' AND c.REC_STATE = '170000001') else (SELECT c.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || c.DISP_OBJ_ID FROM gom_bdw_sec_local_relate_info a2 LEFT JOIN gom_disp_srv_s b ON b.area_id = a2.masterarea LEFT JOIN GOM_DISP_DETAIL_SRV_S c ON c.DISP_SRV_ID = b.id LEFT JOIN UOS_TACHE e ON e.tache_code = b.tache_code LEFT JOIN GOM_PS_2_WO_S d ON d.tache_id = e.id WHERE a2.order_id = #{orderId} AND d.id = #{psId} AND b.REC_STATE = '170000001' AND c.REC_STATE = '170000001') end from ( select count(1) NO1 from gom_bdw_sec_local_relate_info gb where gb.order_id = #{orderId})

select case when exists( select do.DISP_OBJ from GOM_BDW_DISP_OBJ do LEFT JOIN UOS_TACHE ut ON ut.id = do.tache_id LEFT JOIN GOM_PS_2_WO_S pws ON pws.tache_id = ut.id WHERE pws.id = #{psId} AND do.order_id = #{orderId} and do.disp_state = '10A' ) then ( select do.DISP_OBJ from GOM_BDW_DISP_OBJ do LEFT JOIN UOS_TACHE ut ON ut.id = do.tache_id LEFT JOIN GOM_PS_2_WO_S pws ON pws.tache_id = ut.id WHERE pws.id = #{psId} AND do.order_id = #{orderId} and do.disp_state = '10A') else ( SELECT NVL2(D.DISP_OBJ_ID, D.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || D.DISP_OBJ_ID, B.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || B.DISP_OBJ_ID) from gom_disp_srv_s A, GOM_PS_2_WO_S B, UOS_TACHE C, GOM_DISP_DETAIL_SRV_S D, gom_ord_key_info E where B.id = #{psId} AND E.Order_Id = #{orderId} AND B.tache_id = C.id and A.tache_code = C.tache_code AND D.DISP_SRV_ID = A.ID AND A.AREA_ID = E.REGION_ID
AND D.ACT_TYPE=E.ACT_TYPE
AND D.SPECIALTY_ID = E.SPECIALTY_CODE
AND D.PRODUCT_TYPE=E.PRODUCT_TYPE
AND D.IS_AUTO = '210000002' AND A.REC_STATE = '170000001' AND D.REC_STATE = '170000001' ) end from dual

SELECT CASE WHEN s.area_id = '350002000000000042766427' THEN ( -- 海南 select do.DISP_OBJ from GOM_BDW_DISP_OBJ do LEFT JOIN UOS_TACHE ut ON ut.id = do.tache_id LEFT JOIN GOM_PS_2_WO_S pws ON pws.tache_id = ut.id WHERE pws.id = #{psId} AND do.order_id = #{orderId} and do.disp_state = '10A') WHEN s.area_id = '350002000000000042766429' AND substr(i.act_type,0,3) IN ('101', '103', '106') THEN ( -- 重庆 新开，变更，移机 SELECT * FROM (SELECT 260000003 || '_J!G@F_' || w.comp_user_id FROM gom_order o LEFT JOIN gom_wo w ON o.parent_order_id = w.order_id LEFT JOIN GOM_PS_2_WO_S ws ON ws.id = w.ps_id LEFT JOIN UOS_TACHE ut ON ut.id = ws.tache_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId} AND ut.tache_code = 'CIRCUIT_DISPATCH' AND w.comp_user_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY w.create_date) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) WHEN s.area_id = '350002000000000042766429' AND substr(i.act_type,0,3) NOT IN ('101', '103', '106') THEN (SELECT NVL2(D.DISP_OBJ_ID, D.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || D.DISP_OBJ_ID, B.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || B.DISP_OBJ_ID) from gom_disp_srv_s A, GOM_PS_2_WO_S B, UOS_TACHE C, GOM_DISP_DETAIL_SRV_S D, gom_ord_key_info E where B.id = #{psId} AND E.Order_Id = #{orderId} AND B.tache_id = C.id and A.tache_code = C.tache_code AND D.DISP_SRV_ID = A.ID AND A.AREA_ID = E.REGION_ID
AND D.ACT_TYPE = E.ACT_TYPE
AND D.SPECIALTY_ID = E.SPECIALTY_CODE
AND D.PRODUCT_TYPE=E.PRODUCT_TYPE
AND D.IS_AUTO = '210000002' AND A.REC_STATE = '170000001' AND D.REC_STATE = '170000001') ELSE (SELECT NVL2(D.DISP_OBJ_ID, D.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || D.DISP_OBJ_ID|| '_J!G@F_' ||D.IS_AUTO, B.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || B.DISP_OBJ_ID|| '_J!G@F_' ||'210000002') from gom_disp_srv_s A, GOM_PS_2_WO_S B, UOS_TACHE C, GOM_DISP_DETAIL_SRV_S D, gom_ord_key_info E where B.id = #{psId} AND E.Order_Id = #{orderId} AND B.tache_id = C.id and A.tache_code = C.tache_code AND D.DISP_SRV_ID = A.ID AND A.AREA_ID = E.REGION_ID
AND D.ACT_TYPE = E.ACT_TYPE
AND D.SPECIALTY_ID = E.SPECIALTY_CODE
AND D.PRODUCT_TYPE=E.PRODUCT_TYPE
AND D.IS_AUTO = '210000002' AND A.REC_STATE = '170000001' AND D.REC_STATE = '170000001') END FROM gom_order o LEFT JOIN gom_ord_key_info i ON i.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN GOM_ORG_S s ON s.org_id = i.REGION_ID where o.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT c.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || c.DISP_OBJ_ID FROM gom_bdw_srv_ord_info a, gom_disp_srv_s b , GOM_DISP_DETAIL_SRV_S c , gom_ord_key_info f , UOS_TACHE e , GOM_PS_2_WO_S d WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND d.id = #{psId} AND b.area_id = a.mainorg_bdw AND c.DISP_SRV_ID = b.id AND e.tache_code = b.tache_code AND d.tache_id = e.id and a.order_id=f.order_id
AND c.ACT_TYPE = f.ACT_TYPE
AND c.SPECIALTY_ID = f.SPECIALTY_CODE
AND c.PRODUCT_TYPE = f.PRODUCT_TYPE
AND b.REC_STATE = '170000001' AND c.REC_STATE = '170000001'

SELECT CASE WHEN disp.to_bdw = '否' THEN (SELECT NVL2(D.DISP_OBJ_ID, D.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || D.DISP_OBJ_ID, B.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || B.DISP_OBJ_ID) from gom_disp_srv_s A, GOM_PS_2_WO_S B, UOS_TACHE C, GOM_DISP_DETAIL_SRV_S D, gom_ord_key_info E where B.id =#{psId} AND E.Order_Id = #{orderId} AND B.tache_id = C.id and A.tache_code = C.tache_code AND D.DISP_SRV_ID = A.ID AND A.AREA_ID = E.REGION_ID AND D.IS_AUTO = '210000002'
AND D.ACT_TYPE = E.ACT_TYPE
AND D.SPECIALTY_ID = E.SPECIALTY_CODE
AND D.PRODUCT_TYPE=E.PRODUCT_TYPE
AND A.REC_STATE = '170000001' and D.REC_STATE = '170000001') ELSE (select w.disp_obj_tye || '_J!G@F_' || w.disp_obj_id from gom_bdw_sec_local_relate_info t, gom_bdw_dispatch_dept g, gom_ps_2_wo_s gp, gom_wo w, uos_tache u where t.srv_ord_id = g.srv_ord_id and t.cst_ord_id = g.cst_ord_id and t.parent_order_id = #{orderId} and t.region_id = g.master_region and t.order_id = w.order_id and gp.id = w.ps_id and gp.tache_id = u.id and u.tache_code = 'CROSS_WHOLE_COURDER_TEST' and w.wo_id = (select max(w2.wo_id) from gom_wo w2 where w2.order_id = w.order_id and w2.ps_id = w.ps_id) and g.DELETE_STATE = '0') END FROM gom_bdw_srv_ord_info srv LEFT JOIN gom_order o ON o.order_id = srv.order_id LEFT JOIN GOM_BDW_DISPATCH_DEPT disp ON disp.srv_ord_id = srv.srv_ord_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId} AND disp.DELETE_STATE = '0'

SELECT CASE WHEN disp.to_bdw = '否' AND KI.ACT_TYPE IN (10110101060, 10210101060, 10310101060) THEN (SELECT NVL2(D.DISP_OBJ_ID, D.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || D.DISP_OBJ_ID, B.DISP_OBJ_TYPE || '_J!G@F_' || B.DISP_OBJ_ID) from gom_disp_srv_s A, GOM_PS_2_WO_S B, UOS_TACHE C, GOM_DISP_DETAIL_SRV_S D, gom_ord_key_info E where B.id = #{psId} AND E.Order_Id = #{orderId} AND B.tache_id = C.id and A.tache_code = C.tache_code AND D.DISP_SRV_ID = A.ID AND A.AREA_ID = E.REGION_ID AND D.IS_AUTO = '210000002'
AND D.ACT_TYPE = E.ACT_TYPE
AND D.SPECIALTY_ID = E.SPECIALTY_CODE
AND D.PRODUCT_TYPE=E.PRODUCT_TYPE
AND A.REC_STATE = '170000001' and D.REC_STATE = '170000001') WHEN disp.to_bdw = '否' AND KI.ACT_TYPE NOT IN (10110101060, 10210101060, 10310101060) THEN (SELECT '260000003_J!G@F_' || a.create_op FROM gom_order a WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId}) ELSE (select w.disp_obj_tye || '_J!G@F_' || w.disp_obj_id from gom_bdw_sec_local_relate_info t, gom_bdw_dispatch_dept g, gom_ps_2_wo_s gp, gom_wo w, uos_tache u where t.srv_ord_id = g.srv_ord_id and t.cst_ord_id = g.cst_ord_id and t.parent_order_id = #{orderId} and t.region_id = g.master_region and t.order_id = w.order_id and gp.id = w.ps_id and gp.tache_id = u.id and u.tache_code = 'CROSS_WHOLE_COURDER_TEST' and w.wo_id = (select max(w2.wo_id) from gom_wo w2 where w2.order_id = w.order_id and w2.ps_id = w.ps_id) and g.DELETE_STATE = '0') END FROM gom_bdw_srv_ord_info srv LEFT JOIN gom_order o ON o.order_id = srv.order_id LEFT JOIN GOM_BDW_DISPATCH_DEPT disp ON disp.srv_ord_id = srv.srv_ord_id LEFT JOIN GOM_ORD_KEY_INFO KI ON O.ORDER_ID = KI.ORDER_ID WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId} AND disp.DELETE_STATE = '0'
SELECT r.mainorg_bdw as AREAID FROM gom_bdw_srv_ord_info r WHERE r.order_id = #{orderId}
SELECT r.masterarea as AREAID FROM gom_bdw_sec_local_relate_info r WHERE r.order_id = #{orderId}
SELECT TACHE_ID FROM GOM_PS_2_WO_S WHERE ID = #{psId}
SELECT SPECIALTY_CODE FROM gom_ord_key_info WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
SELECT PARENT_ORDER_ID FROM GOM_ORDER WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
